//: Material rewards were slightly boosted than the original.
name: [ELDER] Slay 5 giaprey

dialogue.describe: IF YOU SEE THIS SH*T, THEN IT'S A BUG!
dialogue.offer:
* Slay 5 giaprey
Reward: 300z
Contract Fee: 0z
A pack of giapreys are on the loose, they may wander towards our place and that would cost much trouble! You have to slay 5 of them.
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: Try not to get outnumbered.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 300z
Materials are sent to your box.
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, I see you've failed this quest... Therefore, no rewards will be given.
dialogue.failure: Oh, I see you've failed this quest...

** Slay the Giadrome
Reward: 900z
Contract Fee: 150z
The leader of the giaprey pack has appeared near the outskirts of our village. I'd like you to slay the giadrome and seize your victory!

dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: If you can't handle its ferocity, try creating new weapons and armors.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 900z
Materials are sent to your box.

dialogue.offer:
** Slay the Bulldrome
Reward: 1200z
Contract Fee: 200z
The bullfango pack leader appeared near our village and their ill-tempered behavior is about to cause big casualties! Slay this reckless leader and victory will be yours!
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: The bulldrome charges at fast speed. You may need to be careful in slaying such big boar.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 1200
Materials are sent to your box.
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, I see you've failed this quest... Therefore, no rewards will be given.
dialogue.failure: Oh, I see you've failed this quest...

** Slay the Velocidrome
Reward: 900z
Contract Fee: 150z
These packs of black-and-blue striped 'preys are ravaging in the forest, and with their leader around, they are more aggressive than before! Please hunt down the velocidrome for us!

dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: Other velocipreys will outnumber you if you're reckless.

Quest Completed
Reward: 900z

** Slay the Yian kut-ku
Reward: 1500z
Contract Fee: 250z
I want you to kill the giant bird-like monster that appeared in the forest. It wreaks havoc on our place and it must be stopped!
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: Just remember not to get overwhelmed by its strength and make sure you have strong equipments before provoking such terrible monster.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 1500z
Materials are sent to your box.

dialogue.offer:
** Slay the Congalala
Reward: 1500z
Contract Fee: 250z
Do you know of a pink, fanged beast that roams the jungle? You'll have to get rid of that dirty ape to avoid further mischief in our village!
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: You may want to strafe the monster with terrestrial advantage and avoid its attack, it could cripple you in few hits!
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 1500z
Materials are sent to your box.
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, I see you've failed this quest... Therefore, no rewards will be given.

dialogue.describe: IF YOU SEE THIS SH*T, THEN IT'S A BUG!
dialogue.offer:
** Slay the Gendrome
Reward: 900z
Contract Fee: 200z
The genprey packs are attacking our caravans. With their pack leader, other caravans may not be able to defend themselves. And as for you, you'll need to slay that gendrome!
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: They can cause paralysis. Being covered in protective armor deflects this effect.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 900z
Materials are sent to your box.
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, I see you've failed this quest... Therefore, no rewards will be given.
dialogue.failure: Oh, I see you've failed this quest...

*** Slay the Khezu
Reward: 2100z
Contract Fee: 350z
Near this village, a strange flying wyvern called khezu has been spotted. It is strong but I believe you can do it. Do your very best!
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: A truly loathsome wyvern that's dangerous in any kind of attacks, but with strong equipment, you may be able to slay it!
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 2100z
Materials are sent to your box.
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, I see you've failed this quest... Therefore, no rewards will be given.

**** Slay the Blangonga
Reward: 3000z
Contract Fee: 500z
To test yourself to a further extent, I'd like you to slay the chief of the blango packs. Remember, on this quest, negligence is unforgivable.
dialogue.accepted: When you're ready to set off, just head to your destination. Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: There are something else that may interest your will...
dialogue.advice: Blangonga excels on attacking at close range, keeps itself to that point and will try to freeze you with its icy breath.
dialogue.success:
Quest Completed
Reward: 3000z
Materials are sent to your box.
